title: [insideok.ru] Database Dump
content:
http://insideok.ru/db.sql
Внутри - учётки админов на 2016 год.
-- Хост: localhost
-- Время создания: Сен 03 2016 г., 12:00
-- Версия сервера: 5.5.47-cll-lve
-- Версия PHP: 5.4.45
Структура таблицы users
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users( id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, █████ ███████ ███████ ██████████ ███ ██████████ ███ █████████ ███████ ████████ █████ █████ ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=60 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AVG_ROW_LENGTH=5461;
Дамп данных таблицы users
INSERT INTO users (██████████) VALUES ████ ███ ████████ ███ ████ ███████ ████████ ███████ █████ ███ ███ ████████ ███████ ███████ ████████ ██████ ████████ ████ ███
steps: Access the URL http://insideok.ru/db.sql to download the database dump.
Analyze the database dump to extract sensitive information such as admin credentials.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the exposure of a database dump containing sensitive information, including admin credentials, on a publicly accessible URL. This allows attackers to download and extract sensitive data without any authentication.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it involves accessing a publicly available URL and analyzing the exposed database dump. There are no complex interactions or novel logic involved.
